name: Kolbeinn
description: You play as a knight who dares to encroach upon gold belonging to a castle's keeper. Many dozens of knights have tried to do it long before you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel 4000 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 3.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 470 GTX or greater DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
